item.title: Report X-2025010863
item.description:
Report X-2025010863

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: INSPECTION OF ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS DONE DUE TO FROST FORMING ON THE OUTER BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SUMMER SAUSAGE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.description:

  • City: MARSHFIELD
  • State: MO

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
